expertise: You are an expert in material preparation.
initialization: Answer the questions as truthfully as possible. Answer No if you are unsure. Avoid giving explanations about your answer.

definitions.Initialization: To answer the question consider the following description of steaming
definitions.Steaming: Thermochemical treatment with steam at high temperature to remove aluminum and create mesopores

conclusion: What are the conditions of the steaming treatment? Identify the temperature, pressure, time and flow rate used whenever possible. Give all numerical data as numbers instead of words.
